node.title: Police appeal for witnesses to alleged sexual assault in small South Island town
node.description: The attack happened not long after midnight.
node.content: ["A young woman was allegedly sexually assaulted after attending a New Year's party in Riverton, Southland, police said on Sunday.", "The attack happened not long after midnight.", "Police said they'd like to hear from witnesses - anyone who was in the vicinity of John St or Bates St between 12:45am and 1:30am, or has information that could help their investigation, should call Southland police on 105 and refer to job number 220101/8608.", "Or they can call Crime Stoppers anonymously on 0800 555 111.", "Riverton is a small town 30km west of Invercargill.", "\u00a0"]
